title: (x) Handwritten script on website - Handwriting Dakota {Angel}
content:
This particular font was used on a web page inside a sIFR, but I do not recognize it any ideas.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203229im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/text_6692.gif)

 [‹ (x) Secretsundaze logo (almost like Arial Black) - Tahoma/Verdana {Jan E/Florian}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203229/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42659 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Sturdy Futura-esque condensed sans - Flyer Black Cn {Thomas Binder} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203229/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42651 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Capnhud

comments.content:
It’s called Handwriting Dakota which ships with some Apple products. Looking at Mike Yanega’s useful alias list, Dakota on the Clickart CD is also available as Fultons Hand.

[http://bowfinprintworks.com/ListPages/HWFontAliases.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203229/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/ListPages/HWFontAliases.html "http://bowfinprintworks.com/ListPages/HWFontAliases.html")

[http://www.kandjsupplies.com/text\_fonts\_handwriting/fultons\_hand.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024203229/http:/www.kandjsupplies.com/text_fonts_handwriting/fultons_hand.html "http://www.kandjsupplies.com/text\_fonts\_handwriting/fultons\_hand.html")

Thanks Angel71 for the identification help. I thought this font would be very useful on webpage notes.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here
